Question
========

A person achieves a score of 7.2 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 4.3 with a standard deviation 2.1. The z-score of the person with 7.2 good is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 1.38
* 1.73
* 2.31

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1.38: Correct
* 1.73: Incorrect
* 2.31: Incorrect
